title: Boston African American National Historic Site: History & Culture
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture             History & Culture         The Robert Gould Shaw Memorial honors the men of the 54th Regiment. Boston African American National Historic Site  Learn about the African American community in 19th century Boston by exploring the Black Heritage Trail® .   Information on each of the Black Heritage Trail® sites and related places can be found here.  To learn about the Boston Middle Passage Project, please visit here. To see the online exhibition Boston's Crusade Against Slavery, click here. To learn more about our Freedom Rising: The 150th Anniversary of the Emancipation Proclamation and Black Military Service symposium in 2013, please visit here.
